Andrew Chung

About

Software engineer passionate about big data management systems and large-scale distributed systems. Dabbles lightly in machine learning. Contributes to open source.

Current

  • Software Engineer and Apache committer at Microsoft working on Apache REEF

Previous

  • Software engineer at Microsoft working on Azure Stream Analytics
  • Electrical and Computer Engineering at Carnegie Mellon University
  • Teaching assistant for Database Applications at Carnegie Mellon University
  • Technology Intern at Susquehanna International Group
  • Application Developer Intern at JPMorgan Chase & Co.
